PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-16192010-12-14,  ,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. B. Thomas Granger ** RETIREMENTAND ANNUITY ** Superior Court of Justice
PrecisRetirement and granting of a lifelong annuity to the Hon. B. THOMAS GRANGER, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, commencing on February 2, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
